metadata.name: Operator Bloopers Cobalt Strike Modules
metadata.comment: Detects Cobalt Strike module/commands accidentally entered in CMD shell

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('cmd.exe') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-userhunter')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-sharefinder')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-kerberoast')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-smbautobrute')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-nightmare')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('zerologon')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('av_query'))))

output.summary: Detects Cobalt Strike module/commands accidentally entered in CMD shell
